TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT AP_TERMS.TERM_ID, AP_TERMS.NAME, AP_TERMS.DESCRIPTION, AP_TERMS_LINES.SEQUENCE_NUM, AP_TERMS_LINES.DUE_PERCENT, AP_TERMS_LINES.DUE_AMOUNT, AP_TERMS_LINES.DUE_DAYS, AP_TERMS_LINES.DUE_DAY_OF_MONTH, AP_TERMS_LINES.DUE_MONTHS_FORWARD, AP_TERMS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, AP_TERMS.LAST_UPDATED_BY, AP_TERMS.CREATION_DATE, AP_TERMS.CREATED_BY, AP_TERMS.ENABLED_FLAG, AP_TERMS_LINES.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM AP_TERMS_LINES, AP_TERMS WHERE (AP_TERMS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE > TO_DATE('$$LAST_EXTRACT_DATE', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR AP_TERMS_LINES.LAST_UPDATE_DATE > TO_DATE('$$LAST_EXTRACT_DATE', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND AP_TERMS.TERM_ID = AP_TERMS_LINES.TERM_ID ORDER BY AP_TERMS_LINES.TERM_ID, AP_TERMS_LINES.SEQUENCE_NUM DESC

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: User Defined Join
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: AP_TERMS.TERM_ID = AP_TERMS_LINES.TERM_ID ORDER BY AP_TERMS_LINES.TERM_ID, AP_TERMS_LINES.SEQUENCE_NUM DESC

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Source Filter
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: (AP_TERMS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE > TO_DATE('$$LAST_EXTRACT_DATE', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') OR AP_TERMS_LINES.LAST_UPDATE_DATE > TO_DATE('$$LAST_EXTRACT_DATE', 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(NOT ISNULL(DUE_DAYS),IIF(NOT ISNULL(DUE_PERCENT),DUE_PERCENT || '% Due in ' || DUE_DAYS || ' days' , IIF(NOT ISNULL(DUE_AMOUNT),DUE_AMOUNT || ' Due in ' || DUE_DAYS || ' days')),IIF(NOT ISNULL(DUE_DAY_OF_MONTH) OR NOT ISNULL(DUE_MONTHS_FORWARD), IIF(NOT ISNULL(DUE_PERCENT),DUE_PERCENT || '% Due on day '|| DUE_DAY_OF_MONTH||' after month ' || DUE_MONTHS_FORWARD ,IIF( NOT ISNULL(DUE_AMOUNT),DUE_AMOUNT || 'Due on day '|| DUE_DAY_OF_MONTH||' after month ' || DUE_MONTHS_FORWARD))))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_CONDITION_TEXT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Order by the term id and Sequence number
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_RA_TERMS
